name: Track Rules
description: Server-side audio and subtitle default selection with Series → Library → Global rule precedence.
overview: Pick the right audio/subtitle tracks automatically per user, honoring Series → Library → Global precedence.

versions.changelog: Dashboard editor now loads users reliably for admins/non-admins and avoids Jellyfin translation errors by moving logic to an external script.
Initial developer build with rule storage, resolver, REST surface, and session hook.
